Html:
I'm checking out the idols for feral druids and for some reason several of them won't show up under cat and bear model, although under moonkin form idol of perspiacious attacks shows up http://www.wowhead.com/?item=38365

Am I doing something wronng or is there a flaw in the system?

I asked a similar question last week.

Idols with no effects listed in Rawr don't show up for Cat or Bear (some sort of built in filtering).  Any other idols you're not seeing are probably suffering from a similar issue (effects aren't modeled).

(EDIT: link)
